com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KLightSphereTexturedCubeWithoutShadow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KLightSphereTexturedCubeWithoutShadow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KLightPropertiesType, KLightSpherePropertiesType, KLightSphereType, KLightType, KLightWithTransformType, KTexturesRequiredType

    @EqualityReference
public final class KLightSphereTexturedCubeWithoutShadow
extends Object
implements KLightSphereType

    A spherical light emits light from the given location in all directions, with the intensity of the attenuated over distance according to the given falloff value, and is maximally attenuated at the given radius value.

    Light values are sampled from a cube map using the light-to-surface direction and multiplied with the given base color.
